ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection and Health.
This item gives the owner an aura of physical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All allies within 70 units gain +30 Physical Protections and +25 HP5.

ItemDescription.Description: This item deals damage to nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Deals 40 Magical Damage per second to enemies within 25 units.

ShortDesc: Nearby enemies take damage over time.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes attackers to have a chance to be slowed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When hit by a Basic Attack, there is a 30% chance to slow your enemy's Movement Speed and Attack Speeds by 30% for 2 seconds.

ShortDesc: Chance to slow enemies when hit by their Basic Attacks.

ItemDescription.Description: When in range of an enemy structure, that structure's Attack Speed is reduced by 50%. When in range of an ally structure, that structures has its Attack Speed increased by 50%.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Damageable enemy structures within 55 units have their Attack Speed decreased by 30%. Damageable allied structures within 55 units have their Attack Speed increased by 30%.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical Power on use.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical Power by 60 and Cooldown Reduction by 10% for 5 minutes or until you are killed. Also, damaging enemy gods with an ability returns 3% of your maximum Mana. This effect can occur once for each god hit with the ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases Physical Power on use.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Physical Power by 30 for 5 minutes or until you are killed. Also, your abilities deal bonus damage of 15% of your Physical Power to gods. This effect can occur once for each god hit with the ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Increased Attack Speed.
This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 12% for 3 seconds (max. 3 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Basic Attacks to deal a percentage of the target's Health as additional damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - On Basic Attack hits, deal Physical Damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. This only affects gods.

ShortDesc: Bonus damage based on target's maximum Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives increased Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 25% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Lifesteal.
This item gives the owner an aura of Lifesteal and Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Adds 12% Magical Lifesteal and 30 Magical Power or 10% Physical Lifesteal and 20 Physical Power to all allies within 70 units.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's next Basic Attack to deal additional damage after using an ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Using an ability gives your next Basic Attack within the next 8 seconds +75% of your Magical Power as additional Magical Damage. The effect can only apply once every 3 seconds.

ShortDesc: Abilities increase damage on next Basic Attack.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Magical Power and Lifesteal based on the percentage of the owner's missing Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 100 power and 15% Lifesteal at 25% Health.

ShortDesc: Gain Magical Power as Health is lost.

ItemDescription.Description: This item allows the owner to over-heal, converting healing that would exceed your maximum Health to a Health shield.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Healing from Magical Lifesteal can continue to affect you at max Health and is converted to a Health Shield. This Shield caps at 20% of your current HP. This shield has no duration

ShortDesc: Gain a Health shield when you lifesteal while at max Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals you over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 250 Health over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 150 Mana over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 45 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power by 25% for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections by 50 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Penetration.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 22% Physical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner physical penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 33% Physical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the healing and regeneration of your target.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner reduced cooldown on their abilities.
This item grants the owner Physical Penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Successfully hitting an enemy god with a basic attack will subtract 1s from all your abilities currently on cooldown. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

ShortDesc: Physical Penetration and Attack Speed with situational Cooldown Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Mana.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For 8 seconds after using an ability, your next basic attack will deal an additional 10% damage. The effect can only occur every 3 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Mana on kills and converts your Mana to additional Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 15 Mana per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill, and 1 Stack for a minion kill (max. 50 stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Gain Stacks of Mana from kills and converts Mana to Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner bonus damage on the next Basic Attack after using an ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
PASSIVE - For 8s after using an ability, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 30% damage.
PASSIVE - This item grants 2.5 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana.

ShortDesc: Using abilities gives your next Basic Attack bonus damage based on Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy restores 10 Health and 5 Mana.

ShortDesc: Starter item for Mages that provides sustain

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 8 Health and 3 Mana.

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks restore Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item increases durability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - All damage taken is reduced by 5.

ItemDescription.Description: Gives users Gold and Mana for killing Jungle monsters.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal +15 True Damage and your Abilities +15% Damage versus Jungle Camps. Killing camp monsters heals you for 15% of the monster's health, restore 25 Mana, and give an additional 4 gold.

ShortDesc: Gives users Gold and Mana for killing Jungle monsters.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements and other wards within 45 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time.
PASSIVE - Being within assist range of a minion or jungle camp monster death without dealing the killing blow awards 5 bonus gold, and also restores +12 Health and +10 Mana.

ShortDesc: Bonus Gold, Health, and Mana on minion assist.

ItemDescription.Description: Increase Speed.
Increase speed, damage, and attack speed.
These boots give the owner high Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Increases Movement Speed and Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots give the owner Attack Speed.

ShortDesc: Increases Movement Speed and Attack Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant the owner Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every time you are damaged by a god you gain a stack that provides 3 Physical and Magical Protections. Stacks up to 6 times, Lasts 6s

ShortDesc: Provides Movement Speed and Crowd Control Reduction.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant bonus speed while out of combat.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +14% additional Movement Speed and +25 HP5 while out of combat. Each time you damage an enemy god you earn +30 Gold. This cannot occur on the same god more than once every 90s.

ShortDesc: Movement Speed while out of combat.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases Movement Speed.
Increase Speed and Magic Power.
These shoes grant magical power.
These shoes grant the owner reduced cooldowns on their abilities.
These boots grant the owner Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every time you are damaged by a god you gain a stack that provides 3 Physical and Magical Protections. Stacks up to 6 times, Lasts 6s

ShortDesc: Provides Movement Speed and Crowd Control Reduction.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant the owner bonus speed out of combat.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +14% additional Movement Speed and +25 HP5 while out of combat. Each time you damage an enemy god you earn +30 Gold. This cannot occur on the same god more than once every 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals and restores Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 125 Health and 75 Mana over 25 seconds.

ShortDesc: Restores Health and Mana over time.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Critical Chance.
This item gives the owner increased Critical Strike Chance and damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Critical Strike damage is increased by 40%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases Critical Strike Chance after a kill or assist.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Earning a kill or assist fills you with rage, increasing your Critical Strike Chance by 20%. This buff stacks up to 3 times and lasts 8s.

ShortDesc: Critical Strike Chance improves after a kill or assist.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases your Critical Strike Chance. Critical Strikes deal additional damage over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you deal a Critical Strike, you deal an additional +75% of your total Physical Power as Physical Damage over the next 3s. Additional crits refresh this effect.

ShortDesc: Critical hits deal additional damage over time.

ItemDescription.Description: Grants Physical Lifesteal.
This item gives the owner additional physical power and lifesteal.
This item gives the owner increased Movement Speed and Lifesteal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Successfully hitting an Enemy god with a Basic Attack restores 2% of your maximum health per hit.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power and Lifesteal as they build Stacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +.4 Physical Power and +.20% Physical Lifesteal per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks per god kill and 1 Stack per minion kill.  (Max. 75 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Power and Lifesteal from kills.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power and Physical Lifesteal every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy god forges a shield from their blood with Health equal to 200 + 10 per Player Level for 20s. While the Blood Shield is active you gain +10% movement speed.

ShortDesc: Increases Physical Power and Physical Lifesteal.

ItemDescription.Description: Attack Speed.
This item gives the owner an aura that reduces nearby Enemy Gods' Attack Speed and Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All enemy gods within 55 units have their Attack Speed reduced by 10%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces nearby Enemy Gods' Attack Speed and Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your basic attacks are cursed, receiving 15% Reduced healing, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 5s.
AURA - All enemies within 55 units have their Attack Speed reduced by 20%.

ShortDesc: Healing Reduction on your basic attacks and Attack Speed Debuff Aura

ItemDescription.Description: This item makes the owner immune to Slows when hit by one.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When hit by a Slow, you are immune to Slows and your movement speed is increased by 20% for 4s.  Only occurs once every 30 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner increased movement speed and attack speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When a Basic Attack hits a target, the attacking movement speed Debuff is removed from you for 1s.

ShortDesc: Successful Basic Attacks no longer slow.

ItemDescription.Description: This item Reduces the cooldown of equipped Relics.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your relics receive 20% Cooldown Reduction

ShortDesc: This item Reduces the cooldown of equipped Relics.

ItemDescription.Description: Health and Physical Power.
This item causes your Basic Attacks to slow your target's Movement Speed and Attack Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Basic Attacks have their Movement Speed reduced by 30% and have their Attack Speed reduced 15% for 1.25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: Crowd Controlled Enemies near you take more damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies take 10% Bonus damage from you if they are affected by Crowd Control. Does not include Knockbacks, Blinds, or Grabs.

ShortDesc: Deal more damage to any target afflicted by Crowd Control.

ItemDescription.Description: Gives Cooldown reduction and clear-casting upon falling below 30% Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you are reduced to below 30% HP then 3s are subtracted from all abilities currently on cooldown and all of your abilities cost 0 Mana to cast for the next 5s. This effect can only be activated once every 60s.

ShortDesc: Physical Power, Health, Mana, and low HP help effect

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Reduces the Physical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 8.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power or Protections based on missing Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While over 50% Health, you gain +20 Physical Power. While under 50% Health, you gain +20 Protections.

ShortDesc: Provides Physical Power or Protections based on missing Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces physical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Reduces the Physical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Heal Health and Mana on successful ability hit
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Passive - Anytime you hit an Enemy god with an ability you are healed for 2% of your maximum Health and Mana. This can only trigger once per ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection.
This item reflects some of the damage taken from Basic Attacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Reflects 25% of all Basic Attack damage back to the attacker as Physical Damage.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner reduced ability cooldowns.

ShortDesc: Provides Cooldown Reduction and Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: When you take Physical Damage from an Enemy God, Enemies near you become feared.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime you receive Physical damage from a god, enemies within 30 units of you become feared for 1s. This effect cannot happen more than once every 90s.

ShortDesc: Fears nearby enemies when you take physical damage

ItemDescription.Description: Health and Protections.
This item grants the owner damage mitigation when hit by a hard crowd control.

ShortDesc: Grants damage mitigation when hit by hard crowd control

ItemDescription.Description: This item allows the owner to absorb a single hard crowd control effect.

ShortDesc: Periodically absorbs a hard crowd control effect

ItemDescription.Description: This item allows the owner to absorb a single hard Crowd Control effect.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Absorbs a single hard Crowd Control effect or Root once every 70 seconds. When this occurs, the owner also receives 1s of Crowd Control immunity.

ShortDesc: Absorbs a hard Crowd Control effect.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner stacking Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +3 Magical Protection and +3 Physical Protection for each god kill or assist (max. 10 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Gains Protections on kills and assists.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner Damage Mitigation when hit by a hard Crowd Control Effect.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain an additional 15% Damage Mitigation for 3s whenever you are hit with a hard Crowd Control Effect.  This can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Grants the owner Damage Mitigation when hit by a hard Crowd Control Effect.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner Damage Mitigation when hit by a hard Crowd Control Effect.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you take damage below 30% health you unleash a shockwave that stuns all enemies within a range of 20 units for 1s and gain CC immunity for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 90s.

ShortDesc: Stun all nearby Enemies upon falling below 30% Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Health and Magical Protection.
This item gives the owner a shield to damage when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you take damage and are below 30% Health, you gain a Shield with health equal to 150 +10 Per Player Level for 20s. Can only occur once every 60s.

ShortDesc: Gain a damage shield at low Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner an aura that reduces the healing of nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - The healing and regeneration of enemies within 55 units is reduced by 25%.

ShortDesc: Aura that reduces the healing of nearby enemies.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura of magical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All allies within 70 units gain +20 Magical Protections and +20 MP5.

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Attack Speed.
This item makes your Basic Attacks reduce the Magical Protection of your target.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks reduce your target's Magical Protection by 12% for 3s (max 3 Stacks).

ItemDescription.Description: Successful Basic Attacks grant stacks of additional Magical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Passive - Successfully hitting enemies or structures with basic attacks gives you a stacking Magical Power buff of 10 per stack. Stacks up to 5 times, Stacks last 5s.

ShortDesc: Stacking Power buff on successful Basic Attacks

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes Successful Basic Attacks to heal you for Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Passive -  Each basic attack that hits an enemy god heals you for 2% of your maximum Health and Mana per hit

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Penetration.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +22% Magical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner magical penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +33% Magical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's abilities to reduce the healing and regeneration of their targets.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

ShortDesc: Enemies hit by your abilities have reduced healing and regen.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your damaging abilities to reduce Magical Protections of the target.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities reduce your target's Magical Protection by 10 for 5 seconds (max. 3 Stacks).

ItemDescription.Description: This item reduces ability cooldowns after a kill or assist
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you receive a kill or assist on an Enemy God all of your cooldowns are reduced by 1 seconds.

ShortDesc: Reduces ability cooldowns after a kill or assist

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Health.
This item gives the owner a healing and regeneration aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - The Healing of allies within 70 units is increased by 5%. If you are in combat, Healing of allies within 70 units is increased by an additional 10%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your damaging abilities to slow your targets.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging abilities will move 25% Slower for 2 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner permanent Stacks of Health and Magical Power on minion kills.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +3 Health and +.6 Magical Power per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill and 1 Stack per minion kill.  (Max. 100 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Increase max. Health and Power from minion kills.

ItemDescription.Description: This item converts your Health into Magical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal bonus Magical damage to enemy gods equal to 5% of their max Health. This effect can only happen once every 10s.

ShortDesc: Abilities deal bonus damage based on targets maximum health

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner a healing and Health regeneration aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - The Healing of allies within 70 units is increased by 10%. If you are in combat, Healing of allies within 70 units is increased by an additional 20%

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Mana.
This item gives the owner additional Mana on kills and converts all Mana to Magical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 10 Mana per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill and 1 Stack for a minion kill (max. 75 Stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Magical Power.

ShortDesc: Gain Mana Stacks from kills and converts Mana to Magical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's ability to deal a percentage of the target's Health as additional damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When a god takes damage from your abilities, they take 10% of their maximum Health in additional True damage.  If multiple gods are hit, the damage is applied to the one with the greatest maximum Health.  This can only occur once every 40 seconds.

ShortDesc: Bonus damage based on target's maximum Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and MP5.
This item grants the owner additional Magical Power as a percentage of their current power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Increases Magical Power by 25%.
PASSIVE - Every 10s the Pendant activates, subtracting 1s from all of your abilities currently on Cooldown. The  initial countdown will not start until you leave the fountain.

ShortDesc: Magical Power and Strong Cooldown Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional magical power with kills.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +2 Magical Power per stack, and receive 5 stacks per god kill and 1 stack per minion kill. Half of your stacks are lost on death. (Max 50 stacks).

ShortDesc: Kills grant Magical Power that is lost on death.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Magical Protection.

ShortDesc: Additional protection when hit by damaging ability

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power debuff aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - All enemies within 55 units have their Magical Power reduced by 50.

ItemDescription.Description: The owner gains power as they lose health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Whenever you take Magical Damage from an enemy ability you unleash a shockwave that Silences all enemies within a range of 30 units for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 30s.

ShortDesc: Silences nearby enemies when hit by a magical ability

ItemDescription.Description: Gives protection to gods you heal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Any god affected by your ability heals gains 20 Increased Physical and Magical Power for 5 seconds.

ShortDesc: Provides power to gods you heal.
Provides Magical Power, Physical Protection, and Magical Penetration.

ItemDescription.Description: Gives protection to gods you heal.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Any god affected by your ability heals gains 20 increased Physical and Magical Protection for 5 seconds.

ShortDesc: Provides protections to gods you heal.

ItemDescription.Description: Aura reducing enemy Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemies within 55 units of you have their Physical Power reduced by 30.

ItemDescription.Description: This item has a chance to cause chain lightning, damaging nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every fourth Basic Attack triggers a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 20 Physical Damage. This cannot trigger more than once every 1s.

ShortDesc: Has a chance to trigger chain lightning.

ItemDescription.Description: This item has a chance to cause chain lightning, damaging nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every fourth Basic Attack triggers a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 30 damage +50% of your total Basic Attack Power.

ShortDesc: Every four basic attacks trigger chain lightning.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 10 and reduces your target's Physical Power from items by 10, for 3s. (Max. 3 Stacks)

ShortDesc: Attack Speed and Physical Power stealing.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 10 and reduces your target's Magical Power from items by 15, for 3s. (Max 3 Stacks)

ShortDesc: Attack Speed item that Reduces enemies' Magical Power

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities take an additional 30 Physical Damage over 2s. (Max 2 Stacks)

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item for Magical users restores Mana and gives the owner bonus Damage on damaging Abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Gain 1 stack every time you hit an enemy with a basic attack. If you have 5 stacks, The next time you deal damage with an ability the stacks are consumed, and that ability and any abilities used in the next 3s will deal bonus damage equal to having +40 Magical Power for those abilities.

ShortDesc: Collect souls to deal extra damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Relics provide special powers available to all gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Relics provide special powers available to all gods. Your first Relic is free at Level 1 and your Second Relic is unlocked once you reach Level 12.

ShortDesc: Relics provide special powers available to all gods.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 40% for 5s and cleanses them of Slows. Cooldown - 150s

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 units by 50% for 10s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 2s, preventing you from taking action. You may still move. Cooldown - 160s.

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The  relics Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Deals no Damage to Jungle Bosses. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters.

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 55 units away instantly. You have to be Out of Combat for 3s to use this. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Cooldown - 160s.

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 200s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 15% of your maximum Health and 35% of your maximum Mana. Allied gods within 35 units are also restored. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Magical and Physical Protections of allied gods within 35 units by 30 for 5s. Also, all damage taken is reduced by 5%. Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 50% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5s, back to its owner as Magical Damage. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit, dealing 40 True Damage +14 Damage per God level, and increases their damage taken by 15% for 5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk and Basic Attack penalty Immune.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for 5s. It also grants 40% Crowd Control Reduction and Knockup Immunity for the duration. Cooldown - 180s.

ShortDesc: Ghostwalk, Crowd Control Reduction, Knockup Immunity.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 40% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is also reduced by 25% for the duration. Cooldown - 150s.

ShortDesc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item subtracts 3s from all abilities currently on Cooldown and restores 50% Health and Mana lost within the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 130s.</font>

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 40% for 5s, <font color='#FFFF00'>makes them immune to base attack movement penalties</font>, and cleanses them of Slows. Cooldown - 150s

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 55 units away instantly. You have to be Out of Combat for 3s to use this. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 90s.</font>

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 by <font color='#FFFF00'>65%</font> for <font color='#FFFF00'>15s</font>. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 15% of your maximum Health and 35% of your maximum Mana. <font color='#FFFF00'>Allied gods within 35 units are also restored and also gain bonus 45MP5 and 15HP5 for 30s.</font> Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk and Basic Attack penalty Immune.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for <font color='#FFFF00'>10s.</font> It also provides 40% Crowd Control Reduction and Immunity to Knockups for the duration. Cooldown - 180s.

ShortDesc: Ghostwalk, Crowd Control Reduction, and Knockup Immunity.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 2s, preventing you from taking action. You may still move. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 130s.</font>

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Magical and Physical Protections of allied gods within 35 units by <font color='#FFFF00'>45</font> for 5s. Also, all damage taken is reduced by <font color='#FFFF00'>10%.</font> Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit, dealing 40 True Damage +14 Damage per God level, and increases their damage taken by <font color='#FFFF00'>30%</font> for 5s. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 90s.</font>

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 160s.</font>

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 50% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next <font color='#FFFF00'>8 seconds</font>, back to its owner as Magical Damage. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 100s.</font>

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The relics Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Deals no Damage to Jungle Bosses. <font color='#FFFF00'>Also Stuns enemy gods in range for 1s.</font> Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 40% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is also reduced by 25% for the duration. <font color='#FFFF00'>Cooldown - 120s.</font>

ShortDesc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item subtracts 3s from all abilities currently on Cooldown and restores 50% Health and Mana lost within the last <font color='#FFFF00'>5s</font>. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection and Health.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Regenerates 2% of your max. Health every 8 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants CC immunity after Knockups.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
PASSIVE - If you are hit by a Knockup, Knockback, Pull, or Grab you are instead enveloped by the Earth, becoming CC immune for 1s. Can only occur once every 90s

PASSIVE - Regenerates 2% of your max. Health every 5 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item provides a movement speed boost after healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - After healing yourself from an ability, you gain +40% movement speed for 4 seconds. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

ShortDesc: Provides a movement speed boost after healing.

ItemDescription.Description: This item regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 15% of your maximum Health and Mana over the next 5 seconds when you get a kill or assist against an enemy god or Objective.

ShortDesc: Regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases allied protections and healing received.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Increases the Magical and Physical Protections of allies within 70 units by 20.
PASSIVE - Your Critical Hits increase your Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 20% for 5s.

ShortDesc: Empowers your Critical Hits to give increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Critical Hits to weaken Enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Critical hits on enemy gods afflict them with poison for 2s. This poison slows them by 20% and reduces their damage output by 20%.

ShortDesc: Critical Hits reduce Enemy's Movement Speed and Damage

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Penetration.
Physical Power and Penetration.
This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decreases enemy Physical protections by 10, and increase your physical protection by 10 for 3s (max. 3 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: Gain Protections when near other Gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For each enemy god within 55 units of you, you gain a stacking buff that provides 5 Magical Protection and 5 Physical Protection. Stacks up to 5 times.

ShortDesc: Gain Protections when near other Gods

ItemDescription.Description: Increases your attack speed upon hitting an enemy with basic attacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - every successful basic attack gives you 1 stack. At 5 stacks, your next ability deals bonus damage equal to 100% of your physical power to the first enemy god hit.

ShortDesc: Build stacks to deal bonus ability damage

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Protection.
Magical Protection.
Magical Protection and Cooldown Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you take Magical Damage from Abilities your cooldowns are reduced by 2s. This can only occur once every 30s.

ShortDesc: Magical Protection and situational Cooldown Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Protection and Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you deal damage to an enemy god, if at least 2 other enemy gods are within 55 units of you, you gain 15% damage mitigation for 5s. Can only occur every 90s.

ShortDesc: Gives defensive bonuses for fighting near multiple enemies

ItemDescription.Description: Movement Speed Aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Allied gods within 70 units of you gain bonus 15% Attack Speed
This item can be upgraded from anywhere and replaces Boots for Ratatoskr.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots give the owner high Physical Power.
This acorn heals Ratatoskr upon hitting an Enemy with an Ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime Ratatoskr uses an ability that successfully hits any target, he is healed.

ShortDesc: Heals Ratatoskr upon hitting an Enemy with an Ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Hit an enemy with this!
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Hit an enemy with this!

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals you over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 250 Health over 25 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Restores Health over time, can be refilled in Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 150 Mana over 25 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold

ShortDesc: Restores Mana over time, can be refilled in Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable places a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 45 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Comes with 2 uses that are refilled in Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Detects enemies, can be refilled in Fountain.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases Allies Attack Speed and Damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this Ritual increases Attack Speed of all Allies within 55 by 20% as well as Damage done to all targets by 25% for 10s. Consumed on use.

ShortDesc: Increases Allies Attack Speed and Damage; Consumable.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this Ritual allows you to teleport short distances.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this Ritual will allow you to teleport up to 55 units away, even when in combat. Consumed on Use
Using this Ritual will teleport you to an allied god anywhere on the map after a 4s channel time. Hard CC can interrupt the channel and the ritual is lost. Consumed on Use.

ShortDesc: Teleports you to an ally god; Consumable.

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Protection.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 8.

ShortDesc: Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces magical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 20.

ShortDesc: Aura reduces magical protection on enemies.

ItemDescription.Description: Anytime you would be dealt more then 30% of your maximum Health by a single Magical ability, that damage is instead reduced to deal exactly 30% of your maximum Health. This effect can only occur once every 60s.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime you would be dealt more than 30% of your Max Health by a single hit from a Magical ability, that damage is instead reduced to deal exactly 30% of your max Health. This effect can only occur once every 60s.

ShortDesc: Reduces the the damage of abilities to a maximum of 30% of your Max Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Aura reducing enemy Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Successfully hitting an enemy god with hard Crowd Control will place a buff on all allies within 70 units of you. The buff provides 10 Penetration for 5s.

ShortDesc: Magical Power and Protections item for CC heavy gods

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Being in range of minion or jungle camp death without dealing the killing the blow restores 5 Health and 5 Mana to all allies within 55 units and also provides allies with a stacking self buff of 1% Movement Speed and 1% Attack Speed. Lasts 6s and stacks up to 10 times.

ShortDesc: Starter item for physical gods playing as supports

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item reduces your cooldowns when you are hit by a Physical God
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - This item grants 1.5 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana

ItemDescription.Description: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Whenever you leave the fountain, you gain 40% movespeed for 15s. You will lose this speed early if you enter combat.

ShortDesc: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item gives increasing benefits as you stack Kills and Assists
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Each time you get an assist you gain a stack, or 2 for a kill. At 6 stacks this item provides 7% Movement Speed and 10% Cooldown Reduction. At 16 stacks this item provides 15 Penetration, 10% Movement Speed, and 15% Cooldown Reduction.

ShortDesc: Gives increasing benefits as you stack Kills and Assists

ItemDescription.Description: Using this ritual reveals enemy gods to your team.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this Ritual reveals enemy gods to your entire team and reveals all Enemy wards within 70 for 5s. Consumed on use.

ShortDesc: Reveals enemy gods to your team; Consumable.
